tool_description: Amzlink® is an Amazon API access to all products of Amazon, price tracking, offers, best deals, product listings, at low fares 🚀
name: Amazon Amzlink®
title: Amazon Amzlink®

api_list.name: Get Most Gifted by Category
api_list.description: This endpoint get the most gifted products of an Amazon Marketplace by category

required_parameters.name: d
required_parameters.description: This is the domain TLD of Amazon (.es, .com), depending on the store you want to aim

required_parameters.name: p
required_parameters.description: This is the page number that you want to find

required_parameters.name: c
required_parameters.description: Categories, are string that identifies Amazon cateogries, you can get the ones that are available with the endpoint /categories

api_list.name: Get Most Wished by NodeID
api_list.description: This endpoint get the most wished products of an Amazon Marketplace by NodeID

required_parameters.name: p
required_parameters.description: This is the page number that you want to find

required_parameters.name: d
required_parameters.description: This is the domain TLD of Amazon (.es, .com), depending on the store you want to aim

required_parameters.name: n
required_parameters.description: NodeIDS are numbers that identify the subcategories of Amazon, it can be extracted navigating to them and checking the URL

api_list.name: Get Like New Offers

required_parameters.name: p
required_parameters.description: This is the page number that you want to find

required_parameters.name: a
required_parameters.description: This is the ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number), ID of Amazon
